items.name: Sokoto Heritage Park & Gardens
items.short_description: Immerse yourself in the serene beauty of this newly established park, featuring beautifully landscaped gardens, traditional Fulani architectural elements, and interactive exhibits celebrating Sokoto's rich history. It's the perfect escape for nature lovers and history buffs.
items.address: Shehu Kangiwa Road, Gidan Igwai, Sokoto

items.name: Sokoto Grand Artisan Market
items.short_description: Discover a vibrant hub for local craftsmanship at Sokoto's newest and most modern market. Explore stalls filled with authentic textiles, pottery, leather goods, and intricate artworks, all within a clean and welcoming environment.
items.address: Opp. Sokoto Central Market, Sarkin Musulmi Road, Sokoto

items.name: Khalifa Usman Dan Fodio Digital Library
items.short_description: Step into the future of learning at this state-of-the-art digital library, offering extensive online resources, high-speed internet, comfortable reading spaces, and workshops. It's a beacon for knowledge and community engagement.
items.address: University Road, Close to Usmanu Danfodiyo University Teaching Hospital, Sokoto

items.name: Sokoto Youth Innovation Hub
items.short_description: A dynamic center fostering creativity and entrepreneurship among Sokoto's youth. Featuring co-working spaces, tech labs, mentorship programs, and regular startup showcases open to the public, it's a window into the region's future.
items.address: Gusau Road, By Federal Secretariat, Sokoto

items.name: Gidan Bawa Modern Art Gallery
items.short_description: Experience contemporary Nigerian and West African artistry at Sokoto's premier new art gallery. The gallery hosts rotating exhibitions, artist talks, and workshops, showcasing diverse creative expressions.

items.name: Sokoto Family Recreation Center
items.short_description: A brand new, sprawling complex designed for family fun! Featuring indoor play areas, a miniature golf course, swimming pools, and dedicated picnic spots, it's the ultimate destination for active leisure and relaxation.
items.address: Kalambaina Road, Opp. Sadiq Abubakar III International Airport, Sokoto

items.name: Sultan Bello Cultural Amphitheatre
items.short_description: A magnificent open-air venue designed to host traditional performances, modern concerts, and cultural festivals. Experience the vibrant arts scene of Sokoto under the stars in this newly built architectural marvel.
items.opening_hours: Event-dependent, but often accessible for viewing 09:00-17:00

items.name: Sokoto Riverfront Promenade
items.short_description: Enjoy picturesque views and a refreshing breeze along Sokoto's newly developed riverfront. Perfect for leisurely strolls, cycling, or relaxing at one of the charming cafes dotting the promenade.
items.address: Along Sokoto River Bank, Near Kware, Sokoto

items.name: Alkalai Grand Mall
items.short_description: Sokoto's latest and most expansive shopping destination, featuring a wide array of international and local brands, a modern food court, and entertainment options for all ages. Experience retail therapy like never before.
items.address: Sultan Abubakar III Road, By Old Airport Roundabout, Sokoto

items.name: Sokoto Eco-Discovery Center
items.short_description: A unique educational and recreational facility focused on the diverse ecosystems of Sokoto State. Explore interactive exhibits, indigenous plant gardens, and learn about local conservation efforts in a family-friendly setting.
items.address: Dange-Shuni Road, Near Sokoto State University, Sokoto
